results.title: Barbara Lynch, a Leading Boston Restaurateur, Is Accused of Workplace Abuse
results.abstract: The chef has spoken out againstÂ sexism and abuse, but many former cooks and staff members say she has verbally and physically harassed workers for decades.

multimedia.caption: Barbara Lynch cooking in 2015. Twenty former employees said her fame and connections protected her from the consequences of her drinking and abusive behavior.
multimedia.copyright: Erik Jacobs for The New York Times

results.title: Restaurant Review: Mam Serves the Most Exciting Vietnamese Food in New York
results.abstract: Not quite a pop-up, Mam brings the tastes of a Hanoi lunch to the Lower East Side. Can it put down firmer roots?

multimedia.caption: Bun dau mam tom has many components, but mam tom, a fermented-shrimp sauce, top, is the focal point. Its insistent, penetrating aroma makes it divisive even in Vietnam.
multimedia.copyright: Nico Schinco for The New York Times
